title: Founders Brings "Doom" to the Masses
author: Editorial Dept.
text:
Founders Brings "Doom" to the Masses 04/16/2017 
Founders is excited to bring Doom to your door... in the form of a barrel-aged IPA. For more, see below: 
We are happy to announce the third release in our Barrel-Aged Series lineup: 
Doom may be impending but that doesn’t mean you have to fear it. A collision of worlds, the intense hop character of our imperial IPA mingles with the warm vanilla and oak notes imparted from time spent in our favorite bourbon barrels. Like all good things, Doom comes to those who wait. 
We last released Doom in 2013 as part of our Backstage Series of beers, although it was featured in our taproom as a draft-only option long before that. Its return has been much-anticipated and we can’t wait to share it with you all. 
Doom , an imperial IPA aged in bourbon barrels, is the third release of 2017 in the Barrel-Aged Series, preceded by Frootwood and KBS . There are two remaining Barrel-Aged Series beers to be announced this year, with the returning favorite Backwoods Bastard being the fifth in the lineup. 
ABV and IBU information will be available soon. Doom will be available across our distribution network beginning in May through June, in 750mL bottles and 4-packs of 12oz bottles with a suggested retail price of $14.99/4-pack 12oz bottles and $11.99/750mL bottle.
